text: Andrew Lindsay Lewis, Jr. (November 3, 1931 - February 10, 2016) was an American politician and businessman. He served as the United States Secretary of Transportation for part of the administration of United States President Ronald Reagan from 1981 to 1983. He was widely known as Drew Lewis. He was born in Broomall, Pennsylvania. Lewis, Jr. died of complications from pneumonia in Prescott, Arizona on February 10, 2016 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== *NNDB: "Drew Lewis" *Political Graveyard: "Lewis, Andrew Lindsay, Jr." Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:United States Secretaries of Transportation Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Pennsylvania Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
